mapper.select: SELECT calcDate, calcdate_prd_num as periodNum, divisionGroup_Id as divisionGroupId, IEP_ID as innerEndProductId, round(fact_cnt) as factCount, is_manual as isManual FROM TABLE (pkg_nom_api.get_kpi_data_new( p_Date_From => #{startDate}, -- Дата начала периода p_Date_Till => #{endDate}, -- Дата окончания периода p_TimeUnit_ID => #{timeUnitId}, -- Уровень деталзации по времени p_DivisionGroup_IDs => #{divisionGroupIds}, p_levels => #{levels}, p_OnlyLastPeriod => #{onlyLastPeriod}, p_InnerProduct_IDs => #{innerProductIds}, p_SubInnerProduct_IDs => #{subInnerProductIds} ))

select value_day valueDay, value_day_prd_num as periodNum, direction, divGrp, KP_CCODE as kpCCode, KP_NAME as kpName, KP2_CCODE as kp2CCode, KP2_NAME as kp2Name, oo_doc as ooDoc, CO_RP as coRp, region, blk, calcType, cnt, KP_portfolio_flag as portfolioFlag FROM TABLE (pkg_nom_api.get_kpi_data2excel_new( p_Date_From => #{startDate}, p_Date_Till => #{endDate}, p_TimeUnit_ID => #{timeUnitId}, p_DivisionGroup_IDs => #{divisionGroupIds} ))

select P.PRDSTART_DAY as prdStartDay, P.VALUE_DAY as valueDate, dg1.ccode as directorate, IEP1.CCODE as codeFinProd, IEP1.NAME as nameFinProd, IEP.CCODE as codeToFinProd, IEP.NAME as nameToFinProd, SP.NAME_SHORT as shortName, sum(D.FACTVALUE_CNT) as countAgg, IEP.PORTFOLIO_FLAG as portfolioFlg from DMPR.DEALSTAT_D_SAGG d join DMPR.BPINNERENDPRODUCT_EDIM iep on D.BPINNERENDPRODUCT_DK = iep.dk and IEP.EFFECTIVE_FROM <= D.VALUE_DAY and IEP.EFFECTIVE_TO > D.VALUE_DAY and IEP.DELETED_FLAG <> 'Y' join DMPR.BPINNERENDPRODUCT_EDIM iep1 on IEP.PARENT_DK = iep1.dk and IEP1.EFFECTIVE_FROM <= D.VALUE_DAY and IEP1.EFFECTIVE_TO > D.VALUE_DAY and IEP.DELETED_FLAG <> 'Y' join DMPR.BPMANPERIOD_STAT p on D.VALUE_DAY between P.PRDSTART_DAY and P.VALUE_DAY and P.DELETED_FLAG <> 'Y' and P.PRDTYPE_UK = 3 and P.BPKINDREPORT_DK = (select dk from DMPR.BPKINDREPORT_SDIM where ccode = 'COUNT') join DMPR.SALESPLACE_SDIM sp on D.SALESPLACE_UK = sp.uk and SP.DELETED_FLAG <> 'Y' join DMPR.BPDIVISIONGROUP_EDIM dg on D.DIVISIONGROUP_UK = DG.DK and DG.EFFECTIVE_FROM <= D.VALUE_DAY and DG.EFFECTIVE_TO > D.VALUE_DAY and DG.DELETED_FLAG <> 'Y' join DMPR.BPDIVISIONGROUP_EDIM dg1 on IEP1.DIVISIONGROUP_UK = DG1.DK and DG1.EFFECTIVE_FROM <= D.VALUE_DAY and DG1.EFFECTIVE_TO > D.VALUE_DAY and DG1.DELETED_FLAG <> 'Y' where 1=1 and iep.ccode in ('IEP~13~1','IEP~16~1','IEP~17~1') and sp.uk <> 0 group by sp.uk,P.PRDSTART_DAY, P.VALUE_DAY, dg1.ccode, dg.ccode, IEP1.CCODE, IEP1.NAME, IEP.CCODE, IEP.NAME, SP.NAME_SHORT, IEP.PORTFOLIO_FLAG order by P.VALUE_DAY, iep.ccode, SP.NAME_SHORT
